[vc_custom_heading text=”Hindustan Aeronautics Limited (HAL) is a premier aerospace company under the Ministry of Defence, Government of India, with its Corporate Office at Bangalore. To add value to their business, HAL & AVS Group work as partners to bring in possible business opportunities in the African Market.”
